1062.issue: [E1062] js-controller dependency missing. js-controller 5.0.19 is required as minimum, 6.0.11 is recommended. Please add to dependencies at [io-package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.knx/blob/master/io-package.json).

1078.issue: [W1078] "common.materialize" is deprecated for admin >= 5 at [io-package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.knx/blob/master/io-package.json). Please use property "common.adminUI.config".

2004.issue: [E2004] Version "2.0.32" listed at common.news at [io-package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.knx/blob/master/io-package.json) does not exist at [NPM](https://www.npmjs.com/package/iobroker.knx). Please remove from news section.

5022.issue: [S5022] Please consider migrating to admin 5 UI (jsonConfig) or react based UI.
